UseCases.description: Monitor how and when your spaces are being used to optimize your office resources

UseCases.description: Integrate your ownspecific booking or calendaring system for your meeting rooms

UseCases.description: Control anything else in the meeting room, such as lights, air condition, shades and media players with custom UI extensions

UseCases.title: Informative screens
UseCases.description: Make sure the video screens show something useful or interesting when they are not being used.

UseCases.title: Work environment monitoring
UseCases.description: Ensure well being for your employees, both at the office and the home office, by using the sensors to detect when working conditions are getting sub-optimal.

UseCases.title: Hot desking
UseCases.description: Use the presence sensors and people count features of the video device to show which hot desks are available etc.

UseCases.description: Bring your own favourite web tools to the collaboration arena by adding web applications to the video devices.

UseCases.title: Fire Alarm Awareness
UseCases.description: Ensure that people with headsets and hearing impaired workers are notified too when the fire alarm goes off.

UseCases.title: Virtual Receptionist
UseCases.description: Why a Desk device in kiosk mode is the perfect solution for virtual receptionist when physical staff is not available

UseCases.title: Visitor Registration
UseCases.description: Let customers and visitors register themselves when arriving at your location.
